name: Code Assistant Agent
description: An AI-powered code assistant that helps developers write, review, debug, and document code across multiple programming languages

skills.name: Code Generation
skills.description: Generate code snippets and complete functions based on natural language descriptions
examples: Write a Python function to sort a list
Create a REST API endpoint in Java

skills.name: Code Review
skills.description: Review code for bugs, security issues, and best practices
examples: Review this function for potential bugs
Check this code for security vulnerabilities

skills.name: Debugging Assistance
skills.description: Help identify and fix bugs in code
examples: Why is this function returning null?
Help me fix this stack trace

skills.name: Documentation Generation
skills.description: Generate documentation, comments, and README files for code
examples: Generate a README for this project

skills.name: Code Refactoring
skills.description: Suggest and implement code refactoring improvements
examples: Refactor this class to use dependency injection
Optimize this algorithm for better performance
